code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> init

    init --> p_frm : open-paren / form-start
    init --> p_frm : close-paren / form-end
    init --> d_frm : open-brace / form-start
    init --> d_frm : close-brace / form-end
    init --> d_frm : open-bracket / form-start
    init --> d_frm : close-bracket / form-end
    init --> o_frm : other-char / form-start
    init --> init : ws-char / (no-op)

    p_frm --> p_frm : open-paren / form-start
    p_frm --> p_frm : close-paren / form-end
    p_frm --> p_frm : ws-char / (no-op)
    p_frm --> p_frm : open-brace / (no-op)
    p_frm --> p_frm : close-brace / (no-op)
    p_frm --> p_frm : open-bracket / (no-op)
    p_frm --> p_frm : close-bracket / (no-op)
    p_frm --> p_frm : other-char / (no-op)

    o_frm --> o_frm : open-paren / form-start
    o_frm --> o_frm : close-paren / form-end
    o_frm --> o_frm : ws-char / form-end
    o_frm --> o_frm : open-brace / (no-op)
    o_frm --> o_frm : close-brace / (no-op)
    o_frm --> o_frm : open-bracket / (no-op)
    o_frm --> o_frm : close-bracket / (no-op)
    o_frm --> o_frm : other-char / (no-op)

    d_frm --> d_frm : open-brace / form-start
    d_frm --> d_frm : close-brace / form-end
    d_frm --> d_frm : open-bracket / form-start
    d_frm --> d_frm : close-bracket / form-end
    d_frm --> d_frm : open-paren / (no-op)
    d_frm --> d_frm : close-paren / (no-op)
    d_frm --> d_frm : ws-char / (no-op)
    d_frm --> d_frm : other-char / (no-op)

    error --> error : (no transitions defined)

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 * 这一块。
不，其实叫 *处理 会更准确一点。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 '*处理'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
